codes.name: OK
codes.description: The request succeeded.

codes.name: Not Found
codes.description: The server cannot find the requested resource.

codes.name: Internal Server Error
codes.description: The server encountered an unexpected condition.

codes.name: Forbidden
codes.description: The client does not have access rights to the content.

codes.name: Unauthorized
codes.description: Authentication is required and has failed or has not been provided.

codes.name: Bad Request
codes.description: The server could not understand the request due to invalid syntax.

codes.name: Found (Moved Temporarily)
codes.description: The resource has been temporarily moved to another location.

codes.name: Moved Permanently
codes.description: The resource has been permanently moved to another location.

codes.name: Not Modified
codes.description: Indicates the resource has not changed since the last request.

codes.name: Created
codes.description: A new resource has been successfully created.

codes.name: Service Unavailable
codes.description: The server is temporarily unable to handle the request.

codes.name: Bad Gateway
codes.description: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.

codes.name: Method Not Allowed
codes.description: The request method is known by the server but is not supported.

codes.name: Conflict
codes.description: The request conflicts with the current state of the resource.

codes.name: Too Many Requests
codes.description: The user has sent too many requests in a given time.

codes.name: Partial Content
codes.description: The server is delivering only part of the resource due to a range request.

codes.name: No Content
codes.description: The request was successful, but there is no content to send.

codes.name: Accepted
codes.description: The request has been received but not yet processed.

codes.name: Non-Authoritative Information
codes.description: Returned metadata is not from the origin server.

codes.name: Reset Content
codes.description: The client should reset the document view.

codes.name: Continue
codes.description: The client should continue with its request.

codes.name: Switching Protocols
codes.description: The server is switching protocols as requested.

codes.name: Processing
codes.description: The server has received the request and is processing it.

codes.name: Early Hints
codes.description: Allows preloading of resources while preparing a response.

codes.name: I'm a Teapot
codes.description: An April Fools' joke from 1998, not used in practice.

codes.name: Unavailable For Legal Reasons
codes.description: The resource is restricted due to legal reasons.

codes.name: Precondition Required
codes.description: The server requires the request to be conditional.

codes.name: Precondition Failed
codes.description: One or more conditions in the request header fields were not met.

codes.name: Unsupported Media Type
codes.description: The request media format is not supported by the server.

codes.name: Expectation Failed
codes.description: The server cannot meet the requirements of the Expect header.

codes.name: Unprocessable Entity
codes.description: The request was well-formed but could not be followed due to semantic errors.

codes.name: Locked
codes.description: The resource is locked and cannot be accessed.

codes.name: Failed Dependency
codes.description: The request failed due to a failure of a previous request.

codes.name: Loop Detected
codes.description: The server detected an infinite loop while processing the request.

codes.name: Multi-Status
codes.description: Provides multiple status responses for multiple operations.

codes.name: Already Reported
codes.description: The resource was already reported in the response.

codes.name: IM Used
codes.description: The server has fulfilled a request for the resource.

codes.name: Not Extended
codes.description: Further extensions are required for the request to be fulfilled.
